EmailTemplate.description: An email to notify a Consumer when their Service Request has been resolved.
EmailTemplate.name: Consumer Service Request Closed Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Service Request {!Case.CaseNumber} Has Been Resolved
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Case.Contact},
Your Service Request has been resolved. Thank you for bringing this to my attention. The following action has been taken:
I apologize for any inconvenience this has caused. Please let me know if you have any questions.
Thank you,
